name: Crazy Cranes
description:
Crazy Cranes.
They are out of control.
An endless random avoidance game that needs some crazy skills.
Tap left or right of the screen to move.
Guide our crazy character, and avoid everything.
Watch for the cranes, they go fast, slow and all over the place.
Collect the stars to earn points.
Collect the Gems to unlock new characters.

Compete on the leaderboard.
Share with your friends and challenge the world.
